Articles.Title: Consuming REST API with Swagger
Articles.Description:
Nick looks at consuming a REST based API by first importing its Swagger and using that to generate the code for accessing the API.

Consuming REST API with Swagger / OpenAPI in Xamarin and Uno Applications by Nick
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/thenickrandolph

Articles.Title: How To Convert Base 64 to Image in Xamarin
Articles.Description:
Learn how to convert Image to base 64 and vice versa which is useful for transferring image data.

How To Convert Base 64 to Image in Xamarin by Logesh Palani
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/logeshpalani98

Articles.Title: Visualizing Easings
Articles.Description:
A useful site to view common easing curves on a range of interfaces.

Easings - Generate Cubic Bezier Easing Curves by Works
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/worksdotpm

Articles.Title: Stack Overflow Developer Survey 2020
Articles.Description:
This report is based on a survey of 65,000 software developers from 186 countries around the world.

Stack Overflow Developer Survey 2020 by [Stack Overflow]

Articles.Title: Code Snippet for Xamarin Month: It's all in the Name
Articles.Description:
Naming is hard! But consistency is also important. In this entry to #XamarinMonth, Tom shares a code snippet for creating test methods, that help prompt for a consistent and clear naming style.

Code Snippet for Xamarin Month: It's all in the Name by Tom Soderling
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/tomsoderling

Articles.Title: Building and releasing a Xamarin WatchOS app to TestFlight
Articles.Description:
A really helpful and detailed story here from Damian on building and relasing a WatchOS app to TestFlight for beta testing. Not only does he cover how, but also the issues he faced and how he resolved them. A troubleshooting masterclass!

Building and releasing a Xamarin WatchOS app to TestFlightBuilding and releasing a Xamarin WatchOS app to TestFlight by Damian Mehers
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/damianmehers

Articles.Title: Simplifying Xamarin.Forms Grid Column and Row Definitions
Articles.Description:
One of the downsides of XAML is that it can become very verbose. A specific area where this happens is when using a Grid and you start defining rows and columns. To overcome this, a change has been merged that will make your live (and XAML!) a whole lot easier. In this post you will learn how.

Simplifying Xamarin.Forms Grid Column and Row Definitions by Gerald
Articles.Author: https://blog.verslu.is/author/admin/

Articles.Title: Iconic Text Avatars
Articles.Description:
Text Avatars are the most elegant alternative to profile pictures in modern design. In this post, Ahmed shares how to achieve this with SkiaSharp.

Create Iconic Text Avatars using skiasharp and xamarin forms by Ahmed Fouad
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/mcc_ahmed

Articles.Title: Get started with TinyMvvm
Articles.Description:
This is a tutorial that will guide you through how to get started building an app using Xamarin.Forms and TinyMvvm.

Get started with TinyMvvm by Daniel Hindrikes
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/hindrikes

Articles.Title: Cleanup Your Xamarin.Forms MVVM Bindings Using Value Converters
Articles.Description:
When working with Data Binding in Xamarin.Forms you can often end up with a property in your ViewModel that's of the wrong type or needs to be converted.

Cleanup Your Xamarin.Forms MVVM Bindings Using Value Converters by Lachlan Gordon
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/lachlanwgordon

Articles.Title: Snippets for TinyMvvm
Articles.Description:
This blog post is a part of the Xamarin Month, a great initiative by Luis Matos. Daniel shares his favorite snippets for using TinyMvvm.

Snippets for TinyMvvm by Daniel Hindrikes
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/hindrikes

Articles.Title: Validation Snippets in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description:
In this article Charlin Agramonte shares snippets for form Validation which is an important part of any application that allows data entry.

Validation Snippets in Xamarin Forms by Charlin Agramonte
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/chard003

Articles.Title: Working with connectivity in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description:
As Developers, it's important to handle the connection states of our applications because you can make decisions based on what to show or do in our App when a certain state is notified.

Working with connectivity in Xamarin Forms by Leomaris Reyes
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/leomarisreyes11

Articles.Title: Overriding Back Button in Xamarin.Forms Shell
Articles.Description:
Udara shares lessons learnt about overriding the the Back Button navigation in Xamarin.Forms Shell applications.

Overriding Back Button in Xamarin.Forms Shellâ€¦ by Udara Alwis
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/udara_alwis

Articles.Title: Xamarin Month - XAML code snippets
Articles.Description:
A lot of us love Xamarin.Forms and also love XAML. This #XamarinMonth entry from Andreas, sharing snippets of common XAML components we use like listview and collectionview, is definitely a really helpful one, not just for saving time but also helping you learn how the parts work if you are new to creating them.

Xamarin Month - XAML code snippets by Andreas Nesheim
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/andreasnesheim

Articles.Title: Code Snippets for Xamarin.Forms BindableProperty
Articles.Description:
Another post as part of #XamarinMonth CodeSnippets. This time a great one from Marco Siccardi on BindableProperty and how to speed up creating those!

Code Snippets for Xamarin.Forms BindableProperty by Marco Siccardi
Articles.Author: https://twitter.com/msicc

Articles.Title: Sharpnado.Shadows
Articles.Description:
For when one shadow is never enough - Sharpnado.Shadows is here to help you out.

Sharpnado.Shadows: add many shadows to any Xamarin.Forms view by Jean-Marie Alfonsi's Picture
Articles.Author: https://www.sharpnado.com/author/roubachof/

Articles.Title: Xamarin Community Standup - Build 2020 Recap + .NET MAUI
Articles.Description:
Join the Mobile .NET Teams for our community standup covering great community contributions for Mobile .NET, Xamarin, Xamarin.Forms, Components, and more. This time doing a build recap and a dive into Maui.

Xamarin: .NET Community Standup - June 11th 2020 - Build 2020 Recap + .NET MAUI by Xamarin Developers
Articles.Author: https://www.youtube.com/channel/uce-f02uzgexdhmhpc3loaqg

Articles.Title: Build 2020 Updates
Articles.Description:
James and Matt recap all of the great Xamarin announcements - and then you can go out and watch all the sessions. Plus this episode covers how to build iOS extension while reusing some Xamarin.Forms pages a new Azure + Mobile documentation center and so much more.

Build 2020 Updates by Xamarin

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict: 205: Monetization
Articles.Description:
In episode 85 of running a business and building apps we discuss ads! Why your app and website should have them or maybe not and if so how to make money.

Merge Conflict: 205: Monetization by Merge Conflict
Articles.Author: https://www.mergeconflict.fm/
